title: [Celebrating the Site's Industrial Life]
other_title: The Handling and shipping of explosives in the Port of Melbourne

abstract: A short, pacey animation on the history of explosives handling and transportation in and around the Port of Melbourne.
description: Originally established for the storing and handling of commercial explosives, the reserve is one of Altona's few intact examples of its rich industrial history. This animation brings to life the story of explosives, the working life of the Truganina Explosives Reserve and its place in the history of Melbourne's western region.
